column1:
function mysql_real_escape_string (str) {
        return str.replace(/[\0\x08\x09\x1a\n\r""'\\\%]/g, function (char) {
            switch (char) {
                case ""\0"":
                    return ""\\0"";
                case ""\x08"":
                    return ""\\b"";
                case ""\x09"":
                    return ""\\t"";
                case ""\x1a"":
                    return ""\\z"";
                case ""\n"":
                    return ""\\n"";
                case ""\r"":
                    return ""\\r"";
                case ""\"""":
                case ""'"":
                case ""\\"":
                case ""%"":
                    return ""\\""+char; // prepends a backslash to backslash, percent,
                                      // and double/single quotes
            }
        });
    }
